clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Transcutaneous Acupoint Electrical Stimulation on Intestinal Obstruction After Gastrointestinal Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Transcutaneous Acupoint Electrical Stimulation on Intestinal Obstruction After Gastrointestinal Surgery in Adults:Single-Blinded, Randomised Controlled Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

collaborator.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University

clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital Xi'an Jiaotong University

brief_summary.textblock: Postoperative intestinal obstruction is one of the most common complication of gastrointestinal surgery, some research have confirmed that transcutaneous acupoint electrical stimulation (TEAS) can promote recovery of gastrointestinal function, reduce the incidence of postoperative nausea and vomiting, our goal is to investigate the effectiveness of TEAS in reducing the incidence of gastrointestinal obstruction after operation in perioperative.

detailed_description.textblock: Participants will be randomly assigned, in a 1:1 ratio, to receive TEAS or Blank treatment (acupoints selection are same with the experimental group, connect stimulator for patients, but not don't give stimulus). The randomization sequence will be computer-generated, and randomization will be performed in blocks and will be stratified according to participating center. TEAS will be treated from 30 minutes before anesthesia induction, ending when teh operation complete. Time of first fart and food-taking ,time of have normal diet after the transplantation will be recorded. The participation of each patient is scheduled for 30 days.

primary_outcome.description: people don't consume any food or fart in 72 hours after surgery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: once a week for 30 days after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: the time of postoperative exhaustion and defecation.

secondary_outcome.measure: adverse reactions of digestive after surgery
secondary_outcome.time_frame: once a week for 30 days after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: the incidence and score of distention, abdominal pain, nausea and vomiting after surgery.
scores on a visual analog pain and the use of analgesics

secondary_outcome.time_frame: once a week for 30 days after surgery
once a week for 30 days after surgery
secondary_outcome.description: the leaving bed time,post-operative hospitalization duration and expenses,quality-of-life in 30 days after surgery.

arm_group.description: Choose Zusanli acupoint(ST36) and Hegu acupoint(LI4),give 2/10 hz dilatational wave stimulation.30 minutes before anesthesia induction,end at the end of surgery, and 1-3 days after surgery(twice a day for 30 minutes).
the choice of acupoints are same with TEAS group,tape over the electrode but don't give electroacupuncture stimulation,the others steps are same with TEAS group.

intervention.description: Transcutaneous acupoint electrical stimulation is same to the traditional Chinese medicine acupuncture treatment,treat diseases by stimulate different acupuncture point.
the choice of acupoints are same with TEAS group,tape over the electrode but don't give electroacupuncture stimulation.
